snippet: SCHANBERG--Sydney H. The Society of the Silurians notes with sadness the passing of long-time member Sydney H. Schanberg, winner of the Silurians' 1988 Lifetime Achievement Award. 1/3...
lead_paragraph: SCHANBERG--Sydney H. The Society of the Silurians notes with sadness the passing of long-time member Sydney H. Schanberg, winner of the Silurians' 1988 Lifetime Achievement Award. 1/3

headline.main: Paid Notice: Deaths  SCHANBERG, SYDNEY H
